body: In this thread is we're I will put all my questions for each question I ask just apply to my post don't add your own post just reply to mine I made this thread so I stop the spam on the forums with all my questions :p
body_tagged: In this thread is we're I will put all my questions for each question I ask just apply to my post don't add your own post just reply to mine I made this thread so I stop the spam on the forums with all my questions :p
title: PigZen's Question Thread

replies.body:
Question #1

Topic: Kits

Recently I have been testing all the kits for the games that involve kits and I have found some that need to be fixed nerfed or buffed 

Walls Kits:
Maniac is totally broken you do not get strength after kills 
Cowboy should be added back and nerfed a little bit ( add me on Skype for that)
Ghast should be replaced by Cowboy
Nexus Kits: the kit leech needs to be nerfed just a But because I only get one heart after kills 
Cth:
All the kits for cth are fine

replies.body: I have a question. What do you want doing that? You non stop posting a lot of stuff. So tell us. What do you want. Because you should have a reason for why are you doing that. Tell us.
replies.body_tagged: I have a question. What do you want doing that? You non stop posting a lot of stuff. So tell us. What do you want. Because you should have a reason for why are you doing that. Tell us.

replies.body:
1. Yeah maniac is broken :(
  2. Cowboy was kind of OP. I'd take a horse and armor over pretty much every other kit just because of speed bonus
  3. IMO leech doesn't need a nerf. It's just as balanced as the other kits, if not a bit underpowered sometimes, due to the fact that you can eat a gapple for pretty much the same effect
